articles.author: Scott Chipolina
articles.title: SEC asked Coinbase to halt trading in everything except bitcoin, CEO says - Financial Times
articles.description: Request would have meant ‘the end of the crypto industry in the US’, according to Brian Armstrong
articles.content: The US Securities and Exchange Commission asked Coinbase to halt trading in all cryptocurrencies other than bitcoin prior to suing the exchange, in a sign of the agencys intent to assert regulatory a… [+3684 chars]
